name: volume-estimate-fwhm
author: Connectome Workbench Developers
description:
Estimate fwhm smoothness of a volume.

Estimates the smoothness of the input volume in X, Y, and Z directions separately, printing the estimates to standard output, in mm as FWHM.  If -subvolume or -whole-file are not specified, each subvolume is estimated and displayed separately.

inputs.name: opt_roi_roivol
inputs.description: use only data within an ROI: the volume to use as an ROI

inputs.name: opt_subvolume_subvol
inputs.description: select a single subvolume to estimate smoothness of: the subvolume number or name

inputs.name: whole_file
inputs.description: estimate for the whole file at once, not each subvolume separately

type.name: whole_file
type.description: estimate for the whole file at once, not each subvolume separately

inputs.name: opt_demean
inputs.description: subtract the mean image before estimating smoothness
